dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4831 IH: Healthcare Tax Relief Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Comstock (for herself, Ms. Stefanik, and Mr. Bucshon) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To extend the moratorium on the annual fee on health insurance providers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthcare Tax Relief Act.

section.header: Extension of moratorium on annual fee on health insurance providers
section.text: Subsection (j)(2) of section 9010 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is amended by striking December 31, 2017 and inserting December 31, 2018.
